body.p:
Newport Ky.
Nov 7. 1864
Gov. Bramlette
Dear Sir,
Sometime ago, I forwarded petition's &c for remission of fine assessed of $75, assessed against William Girty, by the Campbell Circuit Court at its late Feby. Term for carrying concealed Weapons
The facts are set out in a record accompanying the petition, & I think it will be seen the whole thing was a mere fourth of July Spree, & that injustice was done Girty.
If you have not acted on the matter I beg to call your attention to it. Mr. Carlisle mentioned the matter to you a few days since

Campbell Cir Ct
vs
Wm Girty
$75
Remitted
8th Nov/64
